Actions.Text: on run	if application "Mail" is running then		set theQuery to "{query}"		set theFormat to (system attribute "format")		tell application "Mail"			set _sel to get selection			set _links to {}			repeat with _msg in _sel				set _messageURL to "message://%3c" & _msg's message id & "%3e"				set _mySubject to the subject of _msg				set _myMarkdownLink to "[" & _mySubject & "](" & _messageURL & ")"				set end of _links to _myMarkdownLink			end repeat						set AppleScript's text item delimiters to return			set the clipboard to (_links as string)						set myCount to count of _sel			if myCount is not 0 then				display notification "Copied " & myCount & " URLs to the clipboard" with title "Copy Mail URLs"			else				display notification "No Mail messages selected"			end if		end tell	end ifend run
